thread.title: Photo: TV 5 offers film-production workshops in Avon, Colorado
thread.title_full: Photo: TV 5 offers film-production workshops in Avon, Colorado

author: Krista Driscoll
title: Photo: TV 5 offers film-production workshops in Avon, Colorado
text: Expand Photo Public Access TV 5 | Special to the Daily | TV 5 offers film-production workshops Public Access TV 5 is offering its next set of monthly video-production workshops starting at the end of October. The schedule is as follows: Oct. 29, Field Production I, learn to make TV, movies and documentaries; Nov. 5, Field Production II, get hands-on experience using cameras and microphones; and Nov. 12, Field Production III, Final Cut Pro, learn the basics of this powerful editing software. The workshops take place at Public Access TV 5, which is located at 281 Metcalf Road, Unit 203, in Avon, from 6 to 9 p.m. and are free for Vail and Avon residents and $25 per year for other Eagle County residents. For more information or to sign up, email Production Manager Holly Trickel at holly@publicaccess5.org.
